testsuite.name: login.ForgotPasswordTest
testsuite.system-out: Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_resetPasswordBtnColor Testcase execution Started "This method validates Reset Password button color in the Forgot Password screen" Reset Password Background color defined : #5138ee Reset Password Background color displayed : #5138ee Reset Password background colour matches the defined colour code TC_resetPasswordBtnColor Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_forgotPasswordCancelBtnColor Testcase execution Started "This method validates Forgot Password screen Cancel button color" Cancel button Background color defined : #808080 Cancel button Background color displayed : #808080 Cancel button background colour matches the defined colour code TC_forgotPasswordCancelBtnColor Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_forgotPasswordUsernameSpace Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Forgot Password screen Username field by entering Spaces" Entered space in the Username text field Performed click action on Reset Password button field Space in the beginning of username field is not allowed Space is not allowed error message is displayed TC_forgotPasswordUsernameSpace Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_forgotPasswordUsernameMaxLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Forgot Password screen Username field for the maximum character length" Performed click action on Username field Entered text "rZrSdDGmBpyQjbvo" in the Username field Performed click action on Reset Password button field Username must be less than 16 characters error message is displayed TC_forgotPasswordUsernameMaxLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: <span style='color:teal'>chrome Language: <span style='color:teal'>english Login Role: <span style='color:teal'>super admin TC_forgotPasswordCancelButton Testcase execution Started <em><b>"This method verifies Forgot Password screen Cancel button functionality" Performed click action on Forgot Password Cancel button field TC_forgotPasswordCancelButton Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_forgotPasswordUsernameMinLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Forgot Password screen Username field for the minimum character length" Performed click action on Username field Entered text "Imn" in the Username field Performed click action on Reset Password button field Username must be greater than 3 characters error message is displayed TC_forgotPasswordUsernameMinLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_forgotPasswordInvalidUsername Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Forgot Password screen Username field for the invalid data" Performed click action on Username field Entered text "UQiRE" in the Username field Performed click action on Reset Password button field User doesn't exist error message is displayed for invalid username Performed click action on Alert Dialog Close button TC_forgotPasswordInvalidUsername Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_forgotPasswordText Testcase execution Started "This method validates Forgot Password screen Forgot Password text" Verifying Forgot Password text Please enter the registered username to reset password text is displayed TC_forgotPasswordText Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_forgotPasswordUsernameEmpty Testcase execution Started "This method verifies error message for the empty Username field in the Forgot Password screen" Verifying Username field Performed click action on Username field Entered text "" in the Username field Performed click action on Reset Password button field Empty username is not allowed and Error message Required is displayed TC_forgotPasswordUsernameEmpty Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_forgotPasswordValidUsername Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Forgot Password screen Username field for the valid data" Performed click action on Username field Entered text "InfoAdmin" in the Username field Performed click action on Reset Password button field Password link has been sent to your registered email message is displayed Performed click action on Alert Dialog Close button Valid Username is accepted Verifying Login page title Page Title is FMS - Login TC_forgotPasswordValidUsername Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_forgotPasswordUsernamePlaceholderText Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Forgot Password screen Username field Placeholder text" Username* text is displayed in the Password placeholder TC_forgotPasswordUsernamePlaceholderText Testcase execution Completed
